name: Nurse Vacation Winter Fun: The Snowboard Cold Sports Girls Weekend
name_original: Nurse Vacation Winter Fun: The Snowboard Cold Sports Girls Weekend
description:
WELCOME TO CHANTIER FAMILY - WEEKEND OUT SERIES

The wife of the Chantier family has decided to get some cold sports vacation with her nurse friends, they will spend whole weekend between snowy mountain doing snowboard. It's all girls sport fun vacation while other Chantier members are playing poker at home.

There are 5 beautiful Chantier wife's female friends to unlock. You have to control the beautiful female character while avoiding trees, rocks and holes in the ground but don't forget to collect gold coins on your way to unlock new female characters.

IT'S SO SIMPLE - BUT HERE IS THE HELP

How to play?

- Control the character
- Avoid the obstacles on your way
- Collect enough gold coins to unlock new characters

Reach The Craques Potes Family at: family@craquespotes.com
